response.overview: Project-R is a mytho-science fiction thriller where ancient belief systems collide with advanced technology.  During a classified archaeological research mission, a radical scientist deciphers a forgotten myth not as legend, but as encrypted knowledge. As science begins to replicate what mythology once warned against, dormant forces awaken, blurring the line between faith and formula.  Caught between ego and dharma, creation and consequence, Project-R questions whether humanity is prepared to control the ancient power it seeks to revive.
response.tagline: When ancient myth awakens through modern science, destiny fights back.
response.title: Project-R

keywords.name: mythology ancient science archaeology indian mythology science versus faith dharma forbidden knowledge resurrection
